commands.title: Subscribe

commands.description: Get current status of the Therefore™ Integration

longDescription: The Therefore™ Integration for Microsoft Teams allows users to receive notifications and interact with Therefore™ workflows through Microsoft Teams. A Therefore™ user account is required and the integration must be configured by an administrator in the Therefore™ system. Please see the Therefore™ Online [documentation](https://www.therefore.net/help/Online/en-us/sd_t_intergrations_msteams2.html) for more details.
shortDescription: Users receive and process Therefore™ Workflow notifications in Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: Therefore™

localizedDefinitions.longDescription: Die Therefore™-Integration für Microsoft Teams ermöglicht es Benutzern, über Microsoft Teams Benachrichtigungen zu erhalten und mit Therefore™-Workflows zu interagieren. Es ist ein Therefore™-Benutzerkonto erforderlich und die Integration muss von einem Administrator im Therefore™-System konfiguriert werden. Weitere Einzelheiten finden Sie in der Therefore™ Online-[Dokumentation](https://www.therefore.net/help/Online/en-us/sd_t_intergrations_msteams2.html).
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Benutzer erhalten und verarbeiten Therefore™ Workflow-Benachrichtigungen

localizedDefinitions.name: Therefore™

commands.description: Subscribe again or check subscription to Workflow notification

commands.description: Get current status of the Therefore™ Integration

localizedDefinitions.longDescription: La integración de Therefore™ para Microsoft Teams permite a los usuarios recibir notificaciones e interactuar con los flujos de trabajo de Therefore™ a través de Microsoft Teams. Se requiere una cuenta de usuario de Therefore™ y la integración debe ser configurada por un administrador en el sistema de Therefore™. Consulte la [documentación](https://www.therefore.net/help/Online/en-us/sd_t_intergrations_msteams2.html) de Therefore™ Online para obtener más detalles.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Los usuarios reciben y procesan las notificaciones de Therefore™ Workflow

localizedDefinitions.name: Therefore™

commands.description: Subscribe again or check subscription to Workflow notification

commands.title: GetStatus

localizedDefinitions.longDescription: L'intégration Therefore™ pour Microsoft Teams permet aux utilisateurs de recevoir des notifications et d'interagir avec les flux de travail Therefore™ via Microsoft Teams. Un compte utilisateur Therefore™ est requis et l'intégration doit être configurée par un administrateur dans le système Therefore™. Veuillez consulter la [documentation](https://www.therefore.net/help/Online/en-us/sd_t_intergrations_msteams2.html) Therefore™ Online pour plus de détails.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Les utilisateurs reçoivent et traitent les notifications du flux de travail

localizedDefinitions.name: Therefore™

commands.description: Subscribe again or check subscription to Workflow notification
commands.title: Subscribe

commands.description: Get current status of the Therefore™ Integration
commands.title: GetStatus

localizedDefinitions.longDescription: L'integrazione Therefore™ per Microsoft Teams consente agli utenti di ricevere notifiche e interagire con i flussi di lavoro Therefore™ attraverso Microsoft Teams. È necessario un account utente Therefore™ e l'integrazione deve essere configurata da un amministratore del sistema Therefore™. Per ulteriori dettagli, consultare la [documentazione](https://www.therefore.net/help/Online/en-us/sd_t_intergrations_msteams2.html) Therefore™ Online.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Gli utenti ricevono ed elaborano le notifiche del flusso di lavoro Therefore™

examplePrompts.description: User wants to connect their Therefore account to the Teams bot for receiving workflow notifications.
User wants to check the current connection status between their Therefore account and the Teams bot.
User requests assistance or more information on how to use the Therefore bot and its commands.
